name: Dream's Epic Speedrun
description:
This game features:

  • 3 endings
  • Decent graphics
  • Decent gameplay
  • An upgradeable weapon with 3 unique firing modes
  • A choice to divert from the main story
  • Scaling difficulty
  • Enemy variants
  • A secret gamemode (very secret)

How to play:

Press enter to select options, and progress cutscene text.
Press enter to read signs (make sure to read all of them).Press and hold the A and D keys to move left and right respectively.

Press the spacebar to jump.
Use your mouse to aim.
Press and hold Left-shift to sprint.
Touch pickups to pick up said pick up.
Toggle fullscreen by pressing Ctrl-F
